page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE NEAR SETTLE
page.content: I woke up at 7:00 and went down for my breakfast. I had some toast. Then I went to the bus_stop with Andrew. The bus came and we came to school. On the way,we saw a{steam locomotive}called{ {Lord Nelson}pulling some brown coaches. At school, we had maths with Miss Thompson until 10:10 and then we had break until 10:25. Then we had french with Miss Michelmore until 11:35, followed by an hour for dinner. We then had games with Mrs Askew until break at 1:50. At the end of break, at 2:05, we had English with Mrs Wilson. At 3:15 we went home on the buses. At night, I had my tea and then went {haytiming,}which is fetching in the grass for the cows in winter. I go to bed when I get in from haytime which I only do one week in a year. {by GORDON GLOSSOP,13yrs
